column2: Shooting percentage at 5-on-5, a shot is anytime the puck would have went in the net for a goal but the goalie stopped it. misses, blocked shots, or hitting the post do not count as shots. Shooting percentage then is the number of goals made divided by the number of shots. Essentially how often do you score per 100 shots
column3: Save percentage at 5-on-5. A save is anytime the puck the would have gone in the net but the goalie prevents it. So save percentage is the number of saves made divided by total shots taken. It is essentially number of saves made out of every 100 shots5
column5: Corsi For at 5 on 5Corsi is the total of all shot attempts. Shots and blocks and misses all combined together.So Corsi For is the total of all shot blocks and misses for the particular team(in this case the Red wings.
column6: Corsi Against at 5 on 5: Corsi is the total of all shot attempts. Shots and blocks and misses all combined together.So Corsi Against is the total of all shots blocks and misses against a particular team(in this case the Red Wings
column7: CF% -- Corsi For % at 5 on 5:The percentage of shots that that are for the particular team out of all shot taken.Calculated with CF / (CF + CA)
column11: Average age of team weighted by time on ice
column16: Points percentage (i.e., points divided by maximum points)
column18: Goals Against(Number of Goals scored on the team)
column19: Simple Rating System; a team rating that takes into account average goal differential and strength of schedule. The rating is denominated in goals above/below average, where zero is average.
column20: Strength of Schedule; a rating of strength of schedule. The rating is denominated in goals above/below average, where zero is average.
column42: Plus/Minus: -1 when on the ice when opposing team scores and +1 when player team scores. Total for season
column44: Number of Goals Scored at 5 on 5
column45: Number of Goals Scored Short Handed
column50: Number of Assists on Power Play
column54: Average Time on Ice per Game
column55: Share of Points attributed to players offense
column56: share of points attributed to players Defense
column57: Share of Points Attributed to Player
